(Person oder Institution, bei der das Ki: (Person or institution with whom/which the child/children is/are living)
**) Bei nichtdeutschen Kindern ist hier: **) If child is non-German, please state since when he/she has been staying continuously in Gemany.
Das Vorhandensein der Kinder und ihre Un: The existence of the children as well as their placement has to be proven by the life certificate overleaf.
Erkl\u00e4rung \u00fcber Kinder, die au\: Information concerning the children that live outside of the household
Es wird hiermit bescheinigt, dass das (d: This is to certify that according to present documents – to personal state of knowledge – the child/children of consecutive number .... to consecutive number ..... is/are residing as stated.
Falls Sie den Nachweis \u00fcber das Vor: In case you can't prove the existence of your children – e.g. it might be difficult in the case of children abroad – please contact the Cild Benefits Office.
F\u00fcllen Sie bitte den Abschnitt A gu: Please fill in section A legibly. Your given information in section B has to be certified by the competent registry office (Einwohnermeldeamt/Residents' Registration Office) or another public authority and marked with an official seal or stamp.
F\u00fcr Kinder in Schul- oder Berufsaus: For children in school education or apprenticeship a certificate of enrolment or a certificate of training can be handed in instead of a life certificate. This mustn't be older than six month. The corresponding forms are available at the Child Benefits Office.
F\u00fcr Kinder, die in einem Heim unter: For children that are staying at a home, the director can issue the certificate.
Ich erkl\u00e4re hiermit, dass folgendes: I hereby declare that the following child/children:
Kindergeld kann grunds\u00e4tzlich nur f: Generally child benefit can only be paid for children, living at the applicant's household. Children that are living outside of the household can be considered under specific conditions, e.g. if a child is staying at a home.
Name und Vorname des Kindes: Surname and first name of the child
Name und Vorname des/der Kindergeldberec: Surname and first name of the person entitled to child allowance
N\u00e4heres findet sich dazu im Merkbla: For more details, see the information sheet „Kindergeld“.
Telefonische R\u00fcckfrage tags\u00fcbe: Telephone number during the day in case of query:
zur Vorlage bei der Familienkasse: For submission to the Family Benefits Office
